* Install Paru
{{{bash
git clone https://aur.archlinux.org/paru.git
cd paru
makepkg -si
}}}
* Install xclip
* Set up SSH key for github
* Clone dotfiles repo
git clone git@github.com:merlinvn/dotfiles.git

* Install zsh, starship, fzf

* Setup dotfiles (setup.sh)

* Install neovim, clang, go, autojump

* Install python3 provider for neovim (paru pynvim)

* Clone vimwiki
git clone git@github.com:merlinvn/wiki.git vimwiki

* Install alacritty & Mononoki Nerd Font
paru alacritty
paru  Mononoki Nerd Font
